title: Workshop on Designing Culturally Contextualized Math Instructional Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematics teaching experience and basic instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: A customized mathematics education design competency enhancement course for current professionals

learning_goals: Develop at least three mathematics teaching scenarios tailored to learners' cultural backgrounds
Compose a cultural variable analysis report using a knowledge-based advisor tool
Propose mathematics activity design prototypes suitable for five cultural contexts (South Korea, Japan, France, Mexico, Saudi Arabia)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
